alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 10 at 2:50PM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeast Iowa and southwest Wisconsin through 345 PM CST... At 248 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Lansing to near Colesburg. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Richland Center, Cuba City and Dickeyville around 345 PM CST. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
